meter_reading.notes: Odometer wheels read 02274.9. The red needle is positioned slightly past the 0.03 mark, closer to 0.03 than 0.04. Per the 0.01 resolution rule for dial_value, it is rounded to 0.03. The angle is estimated based on the needle being approximately 1/4 of the way between 0.03 and 0.04.
